text: No possible way for me to be objective here, I am very secretly a sucker for musical theater, I listened to the og cast album a number of times when it came out, and finally seeing the filmed production is about as good as I'd hoped, etc. Since then however there's been a very important and broader reckoning with the failures of neoliberalism and the Obama years (which this has to be the most emblematic piece of art from, no?)â€¦
